ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: on that Day man will say, 'Where can I run?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That day man will say: "Where can I find escape?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: on that Day will man say: “Whither the refuge?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: people will say, "Is there anywhere to run away?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day man will cry out, “Where shall I flee?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: On that Day man will say: "Where (is the refuge) to flee"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Man shall say on that day: Whither to fly to?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: upon that day man shall say, 'Whither to flee?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On that day man will cry: Whither to flee!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day man will ask, "Where can I escape?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On that Day shall man say: whither is the fleeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that day man will say, ‘Where is the escape [from this day]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On that Day man will say: "Where (is the refuge) to flee?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: on that Day the human will ask: 'To (which place) shall I flee'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, man will say, “Where is the escape?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:10] on that day man will say, ‘Where is the escape?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On that day man) the disbelieving man: 'Adiyy Ibn Rabi'ah and his companions (will cry: Whither to flee) from the Fire and take refuse!
